Animation Player & Frame Range
==============================

Adds the Animation Player Buttons (Play, Pause etcâ€¦) and / or Frame Range Settings from Timeline Editor to Dopesheet, Graph Editor, NLA Editor and Video Sequencer

.. image:: images/AnimationPlayer.png

Editors
-------

This is Added to the Editors Below

- Graph Editor
- Dopesheet
- NLA Editor
- Sequencer

Preferences
-----------

You Can Turn Animation Player and Frame Range off in Preferences

.. image:: images/AnimationPlayerPreferences.png
